description:
After spending some time in the water, the gang burns through too much money on gourmet indulgences and "bargain" shopping. What`s Yumi to do?
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: It`s a Vacation to the South, Narikozaka! (Vacation) / It`s a Vacation to the South, Narikozaka! (Contest)
Nangoku Vacance Da yo! Narukosaka! (Vacance Hen) / Nangoku Vacance Da yo! Narukosaka! (Contest Hen)
南国バカンスだヨ! 成子坂! (バカンス編) / 南国バカンスだヨ! 成子坂! (コンテスト編)
